content: **crocheted pot-holders in drops paris the piece is worked in a circle from the middle outwards with stars and bobbles theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-880 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 18 cm in diameter **yarn** 1 single pot-holder drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 17 off white 1 double pot-holder drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100 g colour 17 off white **crochet** **hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 10 5 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
